name: Communist Dropout (Viktor Pekar)
description:
Communist Dropout

An endless runner made in the context of the Berlin Mini Game Jam April 2015.

This game was an experiment project, where everybody attented

https://github.com/vikpek/BerlinMiniJamApril2015

Job Swap Squad

Allan Cudicio - Game Designer as 2D Artist

Raphael Koller - 3D Artist as Programmer/Level Design

Samir Riecke - Artist as Producer/Game Designer

Dennis Lieu - Programmer as 3D Artist

Jasmin Heinemann - Game Designer as 2D Artist

Chika - Programmer

Viktor Pekar - Programmer as Music & SFX (& Presentation)
